titleStmt.title: R. Woods to James F. Robinson
CWG7669

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
1862
Midway Aug 23rd
His Excellency
Jas. F. Robertson

Dr Sir I would be pleased to get the appointment of Medical Examiner for Woodford County in the event they have to draft. I have had 20 years experience in my profession and have always advocated & voted the old (Clay) & Union ticket and believe they are the only true & safe principles. Your union friend &c
